author: ET CONTRIBUTORS
title: View: Need to boost host genome initiative in the era of Covid-19 and other infectious diseases
description: Possibly, environmental variations across latitudes might be the driving force for the humans to evolve particularly for the immunological genes, in order to adapt or defend the environment or the pathogenic response.
content:
By Moinak BanerjeeIn these difficult times of the Covid-19 pandemic, the credo 
jaan hai to jahaan hai -- what use is the world if you don't live -- is becoming highly relevant ,as even the most developed countries with the best health care facilities have n… [+3891 chars]
